title: Bird safari in Australia
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South Australia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Murray Mallee (S. Aust.)
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildlife conservation - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
description: Filmed entirely on location in the Mallee type country of Southern Australia, this film explores the paradise that is shared by birds, plants and insects in their natural environment. Features wonderful close-ups of undisturbed wildlife while the background music is a beautiful symphony of bird songs and calls. Narrated by Fred Parslow.
